resources.string:
Next feature release:
 · New: Cache list menu restructured
 · New: Use abbreviation for name of geocaching service on main screen
 · New: GCVote ratings are now sorted by a weighted arithmetic mean that also considers the number of votes
 · Removed: OpenCylceMap due to licensing issues, see FAQ
 · Fix: Ignore invalid characters when exporting to GPX
 · Fix: Sort by favorite percent now respects attended/photo taken
 · Fix: Relative URLs in cache descriptions
 · Fix: Use weighted arithmetic mean to sort GCVote ratings
 · Fix: TLS v1.2 Support for Android 4.1 - 4.4 devices
 · Fix: Improve sort of events
 · Fix: Raise personal note character limit
 
 
 2017.05.22:
 · Fix: Avoid crash during file operation
 · Fix: Avoid crash when checking for Locus installation
 · Fix: Avoid failure when parsing original coordinates of a GPX file
 · New: Show warning when c:geo is running in debug mode
 · Fix: Fallback if selected GPX export dir is not writeable
 · Fix: Add .nomedia file to geocache data dir to prevent log photos from showing up in gallery apps
 · Removed: Link to Android Wear app in useful apps
 
 
 2017.05.09:
 · New: Implemented new data storage structure
 · New: Allow moving additional geocache data to external SD
 · New: Extract DMS, DegDec and UTM waypoint coordinates out of personal note
 · New: Export owner name to clipboard by clicking it
 · New: More precise computation of distance, azimuth or projection
 · Fix: Do not parse formulas in personal notes as waypoint coordinates
 · Fix: Remove wrong menu item from trackable logging screen
 · Fix: Apply API key for OSM:Cyclemap
 · Fix: Detect that no language has been selected on geocaching.com
 · Fix: Allow resetting global cache type filter by clicking on filter info in lists
